title: Delegate role of representation in Congress

content.question:
Members of Congress who have adopted the
 delegate role of representation normally cast
 their votes based on which of the following?

choices.label:
The preferences of the majority of their
 constituents

Their judgment of what is best for their
 constituency

The instructions of their political party’s
 leadership

Their political party’s most recent policy
 platform

The advice of congressional staffers and
 political consultants

content.answer:
The preferences of the majority of their
 constituents
